  physical_appearance: This is a chakla or a hanging textile. It features a cotton weave with embroidery work. The chakla is decorated with stylized depictions of two figures riding on elephants
 with the Hindu god Ganesha in the center. On the bottom
 there are five dangling panels
 with stylized depictions of birds
 flowers
 and a human figure.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a chakla or a hanging textile. It features a cotton weave with embroidery work. The chakla is decorated with stylized depictions of two figures riding on elephants, with the Hindu god Ganesha in the center. On the bottom, there are five dangling panels, with stylized depictions of birds, flowers, and a human figure.
